front.title: Label Switched Path (LSP) Ping/Trace Reply Mode Simplification

abstract.t: This document adds two reply modes to be used by Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS) Label Switched Path (LSP) Ping and Traceroute: one reply mode to indicate reverse LSP and one reply mode to allow responder to choose reply mode from pre-defined set. This document also adds an optional TLV which can carry ordered list of reply modes. This document updates [RFC4379].
